text: Maurizio Calvesi (18 September 1927 - 24 July 2020) was an Italian art critic, historian and essayist. He was born in Rome. He was a professor at the Sapienza University of Rome. He was also a member of Accademia dei Lincei. He wrote about art history during the Renaissance and Baroque times. Calvesi died on 24 July 2020 in Rome, aged 92.E' morto Maurizio Calvesi.
